data.fullContent: Everyday after Bill is finished working, he spends some time cleaning up his workspace. First he clears the clutter from the desks and tables, and takes all the detritus out to the trash. Then he sterilizes all the surfaces with an antimicrobial, and puts the specimens in a special container.
data.answer: 每天下班后，比尔都会花些时间清理他的工作空间。首先，他把桌子上的杂物清理干净，然后把所有的垃圾扔到垃圾桶里。然后，他用一种抗菌剂对所有的表面进行消毒，然后把标本放在一个特殊的容器里。
